name: Metaseries 01
description:
The Metaseries sketches are 3D audiovisual compositions describing the “history” behind a specific “structural phenomenon” through a partially generative recombination process of geometric archetypes. 

We adop this approach when designing modular, dynamic, procedural, data-driven, virtual architectures existing in metaverse. 

This design method traces back to the Serialism, a composition method that was developed since the first half of the 20th century in the field of music and then applied in architecture by the deconstructivism movement.
